task.title: Playing sound through entire slideshow
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to play a sound through the entire slidshow.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
A sound in supported file format
Steps:

step.cmd: Select Audio and then select Audio on My PC.
Select the audio file you want to add.
Select the audio icon and then select the Audio Tools Playback tab.

result.p: Your audio file will play through slides without interuption.
